tool.name: toolshed
tool.command:
parsec toolshed install_repository_revision --tool_shed_url "$tool_shed_url" --name "$name" --owner "$owner" --changeset_revision "$changeset_revision"
#if $install_tool_dependencies --install_tool_dependencies "$install_tool_dependencies" #end if #if $install_repository_dependencies --install_repository_dependencies "$install_repository_dependencies" #end if #if $install_resolver_dependencies --install_resolver_dependencies "$install_resolver_dependencies" #end if #if $tool_panel_section_id --tool_panel_section_id "$tool_panel_section_id" #end if #if $new_tool_panel_section_label --new_tool_panel_section_label "$new_tool_panel_section_label" #end if
| jq -S . > $results

input.name: tool_shed_url
input.label: tool_shed_url
input.help: URL of the Tool Shed from which the repository should be installed from (e.g., ``https://testtoolshed.g2.bx.psu.edu``)

input.name: name
input.label: name
input.help: The name of the repository that should be installed

input.name: owner
input.label: owner
input.help: The name of the repository owner

input.name: changeset_revision
input.label: changeset_revision
input.help: The revision of the repository to be installed

input.name: install_tool_dependencies
input.help: Whether or not to automatically handle tool dependencies (see https://galaxyproject.org/toolshed/tool-dependency-recipes/ for more details)

input.name: install_repository_dependencies
input.help: Whether or not to automatically handle repository dependencies (see https://galaxyproject.org/toolshed/defining-repository-dependencies/ for more details)

input.name: install_resolver_dependencies
input.help: Whether or not to automatically install resolver dependencies (e.g. conda). This parameter is silently ignored in Galaxy ``release_16.04`` and earlier.

input.name: tool_panel_section_id
input.help: The ID of the Galaxy tool panel section where the tool should be insterted under. Note that you should specify either this parameter or the ``new_tool_panel_section_label``. If both are specified, this one will take precedence.

input.name: new_tool_panel_section_label
input.help: The name of a Galaxy tool panel section that should be created and the repository installed into.

tool.help: Install a specified repository revision from a specified Tool Shed into this Galaxy instance. This example demonstrates installation of a repository that contains valid tools, loading them into a section of the Galaxy tool panel or creating a new tool panel section. You can choose if tool dependencies or repository dependencies should be installed through the Tool Shed, (use ``install_tool_dependencies`` or ``install_repository_dependencies``) or through a resolver that supports installing dependencies (use ``install_resolver_dependencies``). Note that any combination of the three dependency resolving variables is valid.
